I'm back!

rAuq: The site chooses propoganda pages at random, and with the small 
amount that there are (4), it does pick some of them several times in 
a row. But for me to put it into every character profile would 
require me editing 200+ files, which I'm very hesitant to do. I could 
make a page for all of them, though.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> OOC: Adam, Your characters are on the page, last I checked 
> anyways.
> 
> Yanshosh: Just a thought: I think you should make links to the 
> propaganda pages somewhere like in the character pages, or 
> maybe give them their own webpage. I found that it frequented 
> certain banners many times in a row, instead of changing every 
> time making it hard to see all of the different banners.
